segments.source_content:
---
description: Docusaurus is written in TypeScript and provides first-class TypeScript support.
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # TypeScript Support

translations.zh-hant: # TypeScript 支援

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is written in TypeScript and provides first-class TypeScript support.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用 TypeScript 開發，並提供一流的 TypeScript 支援。

segments.source_content: The minimum required version is **TypeScript 5.1**.

translations.zh-hant: 最低需求版本為 **TypeScript 5.1**。

segments.source_content: ## Initialization {#initialization}

translations.zh-hant: ## 初始化 {#initialization}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus supports writing and using TypeScript theme components. If the init template provides a TypeScript variant, you can directly initialize a site with full TypeScript support by using the `--typescript` flag.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 支援編寫和使用 TypeScript 主題元件。若初始化模板提供 TypeScript 變體，您可直接透過 `--typescript` 旗標初始化一個具備完整 TypeScript 支援的網站。

segments.source_content:
```bash
npx create-docusaurus@latest my-website classic --typescript
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4b395385

segments.source_content: Below are some guides on how to migrate an existing project to TypeScript.

translations.zh-hant: 以下為將現有專案遷移至 TypeScript 的指南。

segments.source_content: ## Setup {#setup}

translations.zh-hant: ## 設定 {#setup}

segments.source_content: Add the following packages to your project:

translations.zh-hant: 將以下套件加入您的專案：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save-dev typescript @docusaurus/module-type-aliases @docusaurus/tsconfig @docusaurus/types
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3569d545

segments.source_content: Then add `tsconfig.json` to your project root with the following content:

translations.zh-hant: 接著在專案根目錄新增包含以下內容的 `tsconfig.json`：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_cb57d798

segments.source_content: Docusaurus doesn't use this `tsconfig.json` to compile your project. It is added just for a nicer Editor experience, although you can choose to run `tsc` to type check your code for yourself or on CI.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 不會使用此 `tsconfig.json` 來編譯您的專案。其僅用於提升編輯器體驗，但您可選擇自行執行 `tsc` 進行型別檢查或在 CI 環境中使用。

segments.source_content: Now you can start writing TypeScript theme components.

translations.zh-hant: 現在您可以開始編寫 TypeScript 主題元件。

segments.source_content: ## Typing the config file {#typing-config}

translations.zh-hant: ## 設定檔型別標註 {#typing-config}

segments.source_content: It is possible to use a TypeScript config file in Docusaurus.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 允許使用 TypeScript 設定檔。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_48ec8149

segments.source_content:
<details>
  <summary>It is also possible to use [JSDoc type annotations](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/jsdoc-supported-types.html) within a `.js` file:</summary>

By default, the Docusaurus TypeScript config does not type-check JavaScript files.

The `// @ts-check` comment ensures the config file is properly type-checked when running `npx tsc`.

```js title="docusaurus.config.js"
// highlight-next-line
// @ts-check

// highlight-next-line
/** @type {import('@docusaurus/types').Config} */
const config = {
  tagline: 'Dinosaurs are cool',
  favicon: 'img/favicon.ico',

  /* Your site config here */

  presets: [
    [
      '@docusaurus/preset-classic',
      // highlight-next-line
      /** @type {import('@docusaurus/preset-classic').Options} */
      (
        {
          /* Your preset config here */
        }
      ),
    ],
  ],
  themeConfig:
    // highlight-next-line
    /** @type {import('@docusaurus/preset-classic').ThemeConfig} */
    (
      {
        /* Your theme config here */
      }
    ),
};

export default config;
```

</details>

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_95729a46

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Type annotations are very useful and help your IDE understand the type of config objects!

The best IDEs (VS Code, WebStorm, IntelliJ...) will provide a nice auto-completion experience.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

型別標註非常實用，能協助您的 IDE 理解設定物件的型別！

最佳 IDE（VS Code、WebStorm、IntelliJ...）將提供優異的自動完成體驗。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Swizzling TypeScript theme components {#swizzling-typescript-theme-components}

translations.zh-hant: ## 替換 TypeScript 主題元件 {#swizzling-typescript-theme-components}

segments.source_content: For themes that support TypeScript theme components, you can add the `--typescript` flag to the end of the `swizzle` command to get TypeScript source code. For example, the following command will generate `index.tsx` and `styles.module.css` into `src/theme/Footer`.

translations.zh-hant: 對於支援 TypeScript 主題元件的主題，您可在 `swizzle` 指令後方加入 `--typescript` 旗標以取得 TypeScript 原始碼。例如以下指令將在 `src/theme/Footer` 目錄下生成 `index.tsx` 與 `styles.module.css`。

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic Footer -- --typescript
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_601bdf38

segments.source_content: All official Docusaurus themes support TypeScript theme components, including [`theme-classic`](./api/themes/theme-classic.mdx), [`theme-live-codeblock`](./api/themes/theme-live-codeblock.mdx), and [`theme-search-algolia`](./api/themes/theme-search-algolia.mdx). If you are a Docusaurus theme package author who wants to add TypeScript support, see the [Lifecycle APIs docs](./api/plugin-methods/extend-infrastructure.mdx#getTypeScriptThemePath).

translations.zh-hant: 所有官方 Docusaurus 主題均支援 TypeScript 主題元件，包含 [`theme-classic`](./api/themes/theme-classic.mdx)、[`theme-live-codeblock`](./api/themes/theme-live-codeblock.mdx) 及 [`theme-search-algolia`](./api/themes/theme-search-algolia.mdx)。若您身為 Docusaurus 主題套件作者欲新增 TypeScript 支援，請參閱[生命週期 API 文件](./api/plugin-methods/extend-infrastructure.mdx#getTypeScriptThemePath)。
